alt: People at table for two organizations.
title: Are you a Chicagoland nonprofit that needs some tech help?
description: Have an idea how to make your community better? You've come to the right place. Either contact us or come to one of our meetups to get the conversation started.

title: Looking to use your skills for the greater good and build your resume?
description: Maybe you're looking to pick up a new tech skill. You too, have come to the right place. Sign up for our meetups or join us on Slack.
